Emma Angel is a senior at Harvey Mudd College studying Engineering with a concentration in History. Her focus is in electrical engineering, with experience in PCB design, circuit analysis, and firmware development. She has also worked in manufacturing engineering, where she gained exposure to production processes and efforts to improve consistency and replicability.

Emma is interested in learning more about microprocessors and embedded systems, and she enjoys developing her digital design skills through hands-on projects. She values opportunities to collaborate across disciplines to solve practical problems.
